attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
RT, Hon, Tony Blair
Prime Minister of United Kingdom,

We the people of Southern Cameroon find difficult to understand why your Government has kept quite on the matters of great importance to its people. Since your government came to power, our leader have writing numerous letter of petition seeking your help for its people but without success.
Southern Cameroonians are proud of their inheritance from the English culture. Every nation or people deserve to be giving an equal treatment be it big or small.  
Our rights as a people have been denial and our nation is occupied by a foreign government whether the international communities agrees or not it is the truth and it is high time your government and the international communities accept these realities.

rejection.details: The summary should not contain email addresses - set up the petition and then invite people to sign it using their email addresses
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
